name: Kiss It Better
description:
CW: unwanted physical contact, violation of boundaries, blood/injury

Disco is a normal elementary schooler. He likes to dance, draw, and figure out ways to skip class with his best friend Joanie. But when Disco's favorite adult, Nurse Nina, is suddenly replaced, Disco is suspicious.

Nurse Lucy is tall, pale, and formal. She is friendly, kind, and wants to help every child she meets. She is also, in Disco's opinion, definitely a vampire.

Play detective as you interview other students, teachers, and staff in your attempt to find proof that Nurse Lucy is a vampire. 

NOTE: We're only in the demo stage! Full game coming....someday.
